record.id: field.name="baseQuery" and file.name="variableInfos" and term=NULL and format.name="variableInfos" and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: baseQuery
record.file.name: variableInfos
record.format.name: variableInfos

brief.brief: The select…from… part of the adhoc SQL that obtains the operator name from the variable.

detail.detail: This is related to the join tables.
If the join tables only include the “operator” table, choose "operatorBaseQuery";
If the join tables include both the "operator" and "contacts" tables, choose "contactsBaseQuery";
If the join tables include the "operator", "contacts", and "Subscription" tables, choose "subscriptionBaseQuery";
